There are direct trains from all parts of India to Surendrangar. Some of the longer routes include trains from Mumbai, Delhi, Kolkata, Bangalore, Jammu-Tawi, Kochi, Secunderabad, Thiruvananthapuram, Bhopal etc.
Surendranagar is quite well connected to the entire region of Saurashtra and rest of Gujarat by buses.

Parotha-Shaak.. with super spicy pototo shaak and almost fried parathas... a treat to eat .. best place - Novelty.

Small spicy variant of the regular samosa.  - Try it at Rajesh samosa house.

In addition various street food dabeli, ghughara etc. are a must when visiting this city.
